result.execSummary:
The defendant Demetrius Jermaine Armstrong was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Demetrius Jermaine Armstrong in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Parties request the jury trial date convert to a projected guilty plea date.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Demetrius Jermaine Armstrong in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Discussions held regarding the defendant proceeding with current counsel.  The defendant and defense counsel will proceed on this matter.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for May 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff: 01/19/15

Defendant Demetrius Jermaine Armstrong in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 24.  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

15RM002342  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
01-19-2015

15RM002334  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
01-19-2015

Court ordered Defendant not to be in possession of any weapons or firearms; and not to be in possession of any illegal drugs without a valid prescription.

Court ordered the remaining bail ($200.00) to be returned to the remitter.

Defendant Demetrius Jermaine Armstrong in court.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.
Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br. 24  for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 2, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 1/21/15 @ 1:30pm
